title: So... In regards to forum moderation.
body:
Yes, there has been some easily debatable topics, and whether we feel it is appropriate or not, the mods are definitely attempting to talk to the community. I know you all don't want to necessarily hear what they have to say, but they are human, doing their job to the best of their abilities in a fairly professional manner. 

I'm not going to post my opinion in this thread like I always do... I'm just going to leave it at this...

Things will change on GD, and we can either cooperate, or we can fight it, but either way things will change moving forward. We as a group just need to figure out where we want this ship of fools to head.
